paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for BRCA2, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: female, one diagnosed with breast cancer, one with ovarian cancer

individual_records.evidence_sentence: one of the two Slovene BRCA2 c.5101C>T families exhibits a high incidence of OC, besides BC.
one of the two Slovene BRCA2 c.5101C>T families exhibits a high incidence of OC, besides BC.

functional_data.summary: Nonsense mutation causing formation of a stop codon at position 1701, located in the ovarian cancer cluster region.

variants.additional_notes: Located in the ovarian cancer cluster region.
key_quotes: Mutation c.5101C>T (p.Gln1701*) is a nonsense mutation causing formation of a stop codon at position 1701 which is located in exon 11 in the ovarian cancer cluster region.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: All novel BRCA2 mutations were detected in female BC patients.

functional_data.summary: Frameshift mutation resulting in translation termination at amino acid position 1813, which lies within the BRC repeat region.

variants.additional_notes: Located within the BRC repeat region.
key_quotes: Frameshift mutation c.5433_5436delGGAA (p.Glu1811Aspfs*3) results in translation termination at amino acid position 1813.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: This also applies to the Slovene c.5213_5216delCTTA family.

functional_data.summary: Causes formation of termination signal at codon 1739 located between BRC5 and BRC6 in the BRC repeat region.

variants.additional_notes: Located in the BRC repeat region.
key_quotes: Mutation c.5213_5216delCTTA (p.Thr1738Ilefs*2) in exon 11 has been already found in several HBOC families.

patients.demographics: female, breast cancer patient diagnosed at age 47

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Mutation c.6641insC was identified in Slovene BC patient diagnosed at age 47.

functional_data.summary: Frameshift mutation predicted to form a stop codon at position 2223 located at the 3′ end of exon 11.

variants.additional_notes: Located at the 3′ end of exon 11.
key_quotes: Mutation c.6641insC (p.Thr2214Asnfs*10) in exon 11 is a frameshift mutation reported only once in BIC database.

patients.demographics: female, breast cancer patient diagnosed at age 32

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Mutation c.6814delA was detected in Slovene BC patient diagnosed at 32 years of age.

functional_data.summary: Predicted to form stop codon at position 2279 near the 3′ end of exon 11.

variants.additional_notes: Located near the 3′ end of exon 11.
key_quotes: Mutation c.6814delA (p.Arg2272Glufs*8) in exon 11 was detected in Slovene BC patient diagnosed at 32 years of age.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants and penetrance data were successfully extracted.
